function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lockdown measures in eu member states","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased transmission of covid-19 within the eu due to investment fund activities and interactions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for public health risk in investment decision making","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of social responsibility in investment strategies during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dynamic contagion of covid-19 across the european union","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Staggered overall response and financial speculation","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on diverse range of funds in europe","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investors using alternate options to park their funds due to economic deterioration","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declining yields on treasury instruments due to extreme pressure on public finances from covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in fund returns reflecting the impact of systemic shocks like covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to consider viral epidemics as a significant risk","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scant evidence on economic and social impact of epidemics","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global financial system volatility due to contagious epidemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of technical language without context","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of spreading contagious diseases among the 150,000 people detected in the oxford town centre due to close proximity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks associated with viewpoint-independent human classification algorithm that may lead to overlooking potential health risks and disease transmission patterns","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public sharing of materials and sample videos may lead to misuse of technology for covert surveillance or unethical monitoring practices","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai and computer vision technology for social distancing monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Availability of data in github repository","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilization of human detector model for monitoring public spaces","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accumulating approach to highlighting risky zones in covered areas with poor ventilation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate risk assessment due to varying contamination trends in different areas","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate long-term monitoring of crowd behavior and contamination trends","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of increased density of contamination in covered places with minimal ventilation due to static people","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of high traffic areas showing stronger contamination heatmaps","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of social distancing violations leading to high-risk categories of individuals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection and tracking of individual movement data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification of high-risk zones and creation of risk heat-map","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of environmental noise for visualization of heat-map","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Identifying couples based on proximity and time could lead to inaccurate assumptions about their actual relationship, potentially missing true social contacts or interactions.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Enforcement of proximity-based social distancing measures may result in privacy concerns and resistance from individuals","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for identifying social distancing violations may lead to errors in detection and interpretation of human behaviors","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consensus on social distancing guidelines for family members and couples","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate measurement of inter-people distance due to controversial opinions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unrecognized social distancing violations in risky zones","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Detection of people with partial visibility or truncated objects","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in extreme lighting conditions and lens distortion effects","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social distancing violation due to inaccurate distance measurements","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mass deployment of the system in large shopping malls","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of real-time performance hardware with low accuracy in social distancing monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure of social distancing monitoring models with low speed","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent cases of occlusions, overlaps, and crowded zones in the dataset","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal condition for speed and generalisability testing on the otc dataset","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Benchmarking tests and comparisons conducted on a single hardware and software platform","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Training on a large number of samples from the google open images dataset, including human body parts, increases the risk of model overfitting to specific characteristics of that dataset and may not generalize well to other datasets.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilizing a transfer learning approach with pre-trained models may introduce biases and assumptions from the source dataset microsoft coco into the human detection model, leading to biased predictions and potential fairness issues.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using stochastic gradient descent sgd with warm restarts and a cosine annealing learning rate schedule may lead to challenges in hyperparameter tuning and model convergence, as well as the need for careful adjustment of learning rate values.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through close human interaction and contact","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate training data for human detection model","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the geometric transformation and mapping in the context of computer vision","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
